scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Loan Application Scoring Model
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct sensitive applicant data from a loan application scoring model's output using a model inversion attack.  The attacker leverages repeated queries with slightly varied inputs to infer protected attributes like income and credit history, violating privacy regulations.
initial_goal: Determine the accuracy of a loan application scoring model.
constraints: query_diversity_limit: no more than 5% change in input features per query
enterprise_context: Consumer Banking: A large financial institution uses a machine learning model to assess loan applications. The model takes anonymized application data as input and outputs a creditworthiness score.
